channel.title: Beginning message

item.title: Beginning message
item.dc:creator: @NexRSPS NexRSPS
item.description:
@NexRSPS wrote:

try this

sendMessage(player, "<col=cc0066>Welcome to NerwScape by Savions Sw, Enjoy!"); sendMessage(player, "<col=ff0000>There Is Currently " + World.getWorld().getPlayers().size() + " Player(s) On NerwScape 637!"); sendMessage(player, "<col=ff0000>Server is now ECONOMY BASED!"); sendMessage(player, "<col=ee0011>Type ::Commands to get started!"); sendMessage(player, "<img=1><col=ee0011>Main-Owner is Savions Sw!<img=1>");

Read full topic

item.title: Beginning message
item.dc:creator: @Savions_Sw Savions Sw
item.description:
@Savions_Sw wrote:

sendMessage(player, "<col=cc0066>Welcome to NerwScape by Savions Sw, Enjoy!"); sendMessage(player, "<col=ff0000>There Is Currently " + World.getWorld().getPlayers().size() + " Player(s) On NerwScape 637!"); sendMessage(player, "<col=ff0000>Server is now ECONOMY BASED!"); sendMessage(player, "<col=ee0011>Type ::Commands to get started!"); sendMessage(player, "<col=ee0011>Main-Owner is Savions Sw!");

That is what the beginning message is when you start the server.
Iâ€™m using a 637/639
How do i add golden admin crowns to it.
So its like:

Thanks.
